name: Fireball Hit: Tower Stack 3D
description:
If you wonder to become a fire bender throwing fireballs, you'll like our game. Hit the stack tower with your hyper fireballs. Make the stack tower fall by blasting with your balls of fire. Hit with your fireballs to make the stack tower hooked with fire. Smash that stack tower with hyper fire of your balls. Use given amount of fireballs to make the stack tower hooked with fire and become the master mage. Only hyper powerful wizard can destroy the tower using fireballs. Hit the stack tower with your fireballs and make it hooked with fire. Destroy the tower by making it hooked with fire and go the next level. So burn everything in our new hyper simulator: Fireball Hit: Tower Stack 3D.

In this simulator, you are given some fireballs to complete a hyper simple target: Hit the tower with your fireballs to make it hooked with fire and destroy it. You have limited amount of fireballs, use them, wisely to make the stack tower hooked with fire. One by one, hit the tower to destroy it and make it hooked with fire. The stack tower consists of some sections and you have to hit them one by one. For each level, you have limited amount of fireballs. Share this game with your friends and hit the stack tower with fireballs. Make each section of the stack tower hooked with fire. Hit the stack tower and go to the next level. Complete every level of the game to show everyone that your fireballs are hyper powerful.

Fireball Hit: Tower Stack 3D is a free to play simulator of making tower hooked with fire. Hit the tower with your blazing balls. Hit each section of the stack tower with your fireballs one by one to destroy it. Your fireballs are hyper powerful, so use them to make the stack tower hooked with fire. You have limited amount of fireballs so hit the tower with them wisely, it will be a hyper pity if the tower stays undamaged. Call your friends and together hit the stack towers. Find out who will faster make the last stack tower hooked with fire of your balls. Download our simulator and become a hyperpowerful fire bender for a moment. It is always fun to hit something with fireballs so use our simulator to do it!
